name: dockman
tagline: A terminal-based interface for managing Docker containers and images
description: Dockman is a lightweight TUI and CLI tool for managing Docker containers and images. It offers a curses-based interface for viewing logs, stats, and executing commands without a web UI.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Curses-based interface for Docker management. No web browser needed

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Perfect for SSH sessions

features.title: Log Access
features.description: View container logs in terminal. Quick troubleshooting

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor resource usage in real-time. Performance visibility
